function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to virtual reality technology in low-income countries due to high cost and computing power requirement.","Impact":"Limited access to virtual reality technology hinders medical education and training in low-income countries, leading to disparities in healthcare knowledge and skills.","Mitigation":"Investment in affordable virtual reality devices, improvement of supporting infrastructure, and development of alternative virtual reality technologies that require lower computing power.","Technologies":"Affordable virtual reality devices, improved infrastructure, alternative virtual reality technologies.","People":"Residents of low-income countries, medical students, healthcare professionals in low-income countries.","Owner":"Government, international organizations, medical education institutions."},{"Description":"Poor internet infrastructure and slow internet speed impeding the full realization of virtual reality technology.","Impact":"Undermined potential of virtual reality technology for medical education and training, hindering effective use in healthcare settings.","Mitigation":"Implementation of 5G technology to improve internet speed, development of virtual reality technologies that are less dependent on high-speed internet.","Technologies":"5G technology, low-bandwidth virtual reality technologies.","People":"Residents of areas with poor internet infrastructure, medical students, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Telecommunication companies, government, technology companies."},{"Description":"Shortage of technical virtual reality experts to develop virtual reality applications suitable for medical education and healthcare.","Impact":"Limitation in the development of virtual reality applications tailored to medical education and training needs, hindering effective integration of virtual reality in healthcare settings.","Mitigation":"Investment in training programs for virtual reality experts, collaboration between educational institutions and healthcare organizations to develop tailored virtual reality applications.","Technologies":"Training programs for virtual reality development, collaboration platforms for educational and healthcare institutions.","People":"Virtual reality developers, medical educators, healthcare organizations.","Owner":"Educational institutions, healthcare organizations, government."}]}
